nodes.text: Krash was a male Houk member of the White Maw Pirate gang living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he was overseeing the testing of experimental stims on captured Pantran whitefangs in the Starship Graveyard on Hoth. The operation was dismantled by a Republic operative and Krash was killed in the fighting.
Overseer Krash appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on Hoth, who is the final boss of the quest "Unethical Experiments."
